## 

```{python}
from PyPDF2 import PdfFileWriter, PdfFileReader

# Open the original PDF
input_pdf = PdfFileReader(open("files/CV.pdf", "rb"))
output_pdf = PdfFileWriter()

# Add all pages to the output PDF
for page_num in range(input_pdf.getNumPages()):
    output_pdf.addPage(input_pdf.getPage(page_num))

# Set the permissions
output_pdf.encrypt(user_pwd="", owner_pwd="your_owner_password", 
                   use_128bit=True, 
                   permissions={
                       "print": False,
                       "copy": False,
                       "modify": False,
                       "annotate": False
                   })

# Save the new PDF to a file
with open("files/secured_CV.pdf", "wb") as output_file:
    output_pdf.write(output_file)
